name: ID
definition: the ID allocated to the specific account

name: ASSET_TYPE
definition: the name of the asset type

name: FIXED_INCOME
definition: whether the asset type is considered fixed income and should have duration

name: LBU
definition: the name of the LBUs to show for

name: TAG_LEVEL_1
definition: the tag to recognize the sub asset type

name: PARENT_ASSET_TYPE
definition: the parent asset type of sub asset type
